programmableCalculator

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • programmableCalculator.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: UserInterface Class.

    Description: The Java/FX-based user interface for the calculator. The class works with String objects and passes work to other classes to deal with all other aspects of the computation.

    Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter ï¿½ 2017

    Version:
    4.30 2018-02-25 The JavaFX-based GUI for the implementation of a calculator, 4.40 2018-03-23 The JavaFX-based GUI for the implementation of a calculator along with error term values, 4.50 2018-10-06 The JavaFX-based GUI for the implementation of a calculator showing result value and error term in single text field., 4.60 2018-11-24 Implementing the JavaFX-based GUI for selecting the unit, so that calculation can be done by using the units., 4.70 2019-02-13 Baseline for Project 1(Data Structures). +, 4.80 2019-02-26 Enhanced Version with definitions support with added another window for definitions
    Author:
    Lynn Robert Carter Sumit Singh and Shivam Singhal and Sawan Gaba

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface(javafx.scene.layout.Pane theRoot)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method initializes all of the elements of the graphical user interface. These assignments determine the location, size, font, color, and change and event handlers for each GUI object.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
